body: At 10th level, when a magician uses a wand containing a spell on his spell list, he uses his Charisma bonus to set the wand's save DC. At 16th level, when using such a wand, he uses his caster level in place of the wand's caster level. This ability replaces jack of all trades.
name: Wand Mastery
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Bard/Bard Archetypes/Magician/Wand Mastery
